name: Bennett Froggy
description:
Collisions and Audio were broken in web build so I had to remove it.

Inspired by "Getting Over it" with Bennett Foddy.

Deliver the delicate tadpole to the breeding pond without falling over, or you'll break it! The only problem is you're riding a unicycle.

Controls-

Pedal - W/S or Up/Down arrows

Balance - A/D or left/Right arrows

Jump - Space

Pause - Escape

Restart - R
